[\[315a.6\]]'gro'o/_/bkres pa zas 'dod pa dang /_'jigs pa skyabs 'dod pa dang /_nad pa sman 'dod pa dang /_tsha ba grib ma 'dod pa dang /_grang ba me 'dod pa dang 'dra bar/_de ltar rgyal po sangs rgyas 'dod pa yang de dang 'dra bar bya ba'i rigs so/_/rgyal po chen po de 
[\[315a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa ni log sred can la yang dam pa'i chos ston na/_rgyal po chen po log sred can ma lags pa la thugs rjes dgongs shing skyabs mdzad pa lta ci smos/_rgyal pos smras pa/_'tsho byed kho bos sngon 'di skad ces zer ba thos te/_log sred can zhes bya ba ni ma dad pa/_
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]mi nyan pa/_don yid la mi byed pa/_don yang mi rtogs pa yin no zhes zer na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ci ste chos ston par 'gyur/_'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po dper na mi la la zhig nad tshabs po ches btab pa la/_rmi lam na ka ba gcig pa'i khang par 'dug gam/_
[\[315b.2\]]mar dang snum la sogs pa za zhing lus la yang skud dam/_thal ba'i nang du nyal zhing thal ba za ba'am/_shing skom po rul pa la 'dzeg gam/_bar bar spre'u dang 'grogs shing nyal lam/_'dug gam/_chur bying ngam/_'dam rdzab tu nub bam/_yang thog gam/_khang pa'am/_
[\[315b.3\]]ri mthon po'am/_shing kha'am/_bal glang ngam/_rta'am/_ba lang ngam/_lug gi thog nas lhung ba'am/_lus la gos sngon po'am/_ser po'am/_dmar po'am/_nag po gyon te glu gar dang rtsed mo byed pa'am/_bya rog gam/_srin bya'am/_wa la sogs pa mthong ba'am/_
[\[315b.4\]]so dang skra lhung ba'am/_gcer bur khyi la sngas bcas te lud phung gi steng na nyal ba'am/_sngon shi ba'i mi dang lhan cig 'grogs shing 'dug gam/_lag pa sbrel zhing 'gro ba'am/_sbrul gdug pas gang ba'i steng du 'bogs shing 'gro ba'am/_yang na bud med skra bshig pa la 
[\[315b.5\]]lag gis 'khyud cing lhan cig nyal bar rmis pa'am/_shing ta la'i lo mas gos byed pa'am/_bong bus 'dren pa'i shing rta zhig la zhon te/_lho phyogs su 'gro ba'am/_de lta bu dag rmis nas shin tu mi dga' bas sems gdungs par gyur to/_/de ltar 
[\[315b.6\]]mi dga' bas gdungs pa'i phyir nad kyang phyi phyir na bar gyur to/_/nad phyi phyir na bas gnyen rnams kyis sman pa gnyer du btang ngo /_/gal te sman pa'i steng du mngags pa'i mi de lus thung ngam/_lus kyi yan lag ma tshang zhing dbang po dang mi ldan pa'am/_mgo 
[\[315b.7\]]la rdul chags pa'am/_gos ral po gyon pa'am/_shing rta zhig pa khrid de/_sman pa la 'di skad du myur du shing rta de la 'dzegs zhes zer ba de'i tshe/_sman pa mkhas pa des de lta bu'i sun ma dang /_ltas bkra mi shis pa mthong nas/_nad pa de ni shin tu gso 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]dka'o snyam sems so/_/yang 'di snyam du de ltar sun ma bkra mi shis pa yin mod kyi/_yang gsor rung ngam mi rung snyam nyi ma blta'o/_/de la gal te tshes bzhi dang /_drug dang /_brgyad dang /_bcu gnyis dang /_bcu bzhi'i nyi ma la nad kyis btab na gso dka'o snyam 
[\[316a.2\]]sems so/_/yang 'di snyam du sems te nyi ma ngan mod kyi yang gsor rung ngam mi rung snyam skar ma la blta'o/_/de la skar ma me dang /_gser dang /_snar ma dang /_gshin rje dang /_gsher dang /_gang dang skar ma de dag la nad kyis btab na gso dka'o/_/yang 'di snyam du skar ma ngan kyang 
[\[316a.3\]]dus la blta'o snyam ste/_de la ston dang dgun dang /_nyi ma nub pa'i dus dang /_nam phyed dang /_zla ba nub pa'i dus su nad kyis btab na gso dka'o/_/yang 'di snyam du de ltar ltas mang po de dag ngan mod kyi/_rtogs kyang srid/_mi rtogs kyang srid de/_nad pa nyid blta ste gal te 
[\[316a.4\]]bsod nams yod pa zhig na gsor rung ngo /_/bsod nams med na ltas bzang yang ci la phan snyam sems so/_/de snyam du bsams nas/_sun ma dang 'grogs te lam du zhugs pa dang /_yang 'di snyam du gal te nad pa de tshe ring ba'i ltas yod na gsor rung ngo /_/tshe thung ba'i ltas 
[\[316a.5\]]dang phrad na gsor mi rung ngo snyam bsams nas/_lam du bus pa chung ngu gnyis gcig la gcig drangs te 'thab la/_thor to nas bzung nas skra 'bal zhing gyo mo dang /_rdo dang /_mtshon cha dang /_dbyug pa 'phen zhing gcig la gcig rdeg pa'am/_me thogs pa me rang shi ba mthong ngam/_
[\[316a.6\]]shing gcod pa mthong ngam/_mi'i lag na ko ba nyed cing lam du 'gro ba'am/_lam na rdzas lus pa mthong ngam/_mi snod stong pa thogs pa mthong ngam/_dge slong gcig pu grogs med par 'gro ba mthong ngam/_stag gam/_spyang ki'am/_bya rog gam/_srin bya'am/_wa la sogs 
[\[316a.7\]]pa dngos po de lta bu dag mthong nas/_yang 'di snyam du mngags pa'i sun ma nas/_lam du 'gro ba'i bar du mthong ngo cog kun kyang bkra mi shis na nad pa de gdon mi za bar gso dka'o snyam sems so/_/yang 'di snyam du bdag gal te ma song na sman pa mkhas pa zhes mi grags la/_
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]ci ste song na gsor mi rung ngo snyam sems te/_yang 'di snyam du bsams so/_/de lta bus ltas mang po dag bkra mi shis mod kyi/_'on kyang nad pa'i thad du rtse gcig 'gro'o snyam bsams nas lam du 'gro ba las sgra 'di dag thos na mi rung ste/_gang zhe na/_shi ba dang stor ba dang /_
[\[316b.2\]]byung ba dang /_chag pa dang /_zhig pa dang grugs pa dang shus pa dang /_lhung ba dang /_grol ba dang /_khur khyer ba dang /_tshig pa dang ma 'ongs zhes zer ba de dag thos na gso dka' ste mgon skyabs mi nus so/_/yang lho phyogs nas bya'i skad thos pa la 'di lta ste/_bya rog dang srin bya 
[\[316b.3\]]dang ske ka'i skad dang /_khyi'am/_byi ba'am/_wa'am/_ri bong ngam/_phag ste/_de dag gi skad thos na/_yang 'di snyam du nad pa de ni shin tu gso dka'o snyam sems so/_/de nas nad pa'i khyim du zhugs pa dang /_nad pa la bltas na/_de res 'ga' ni grang /_res 'ga' ni tsha 
[\[316b.4\]]zhing lhu tshigs thams cad lhang lhang por na ste/_mig dmar ba la mchi ma zag pa dang /_rna ba'i nang na sgra grag pa dang /_lkog ma 'gags te na ba dang /_lce gas pa dang /_mdog rab tu gnag pa dang /_mgo mi theg pa dang /_lus skem zhing rdul mod pa dang /_bshang gci 'gags 
[\[316b.5\]]pa dang /_lus glo bur du tsho rab tu gyur te shin tu dkar ba dang /_dmar ba dang /_tshig gi sgra shas mi mnyam zhing res 'ga' ni sbom/_res 'ga' ni phra ba dang /_lus thams cad khra bor gyur cing ngo mtshar gyi kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po byung ba dang /_khong pa gang zhing skrangs nas 
[\[316b.6\]]smra ba'i tshig mi gsal te/_de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas nad g.yog de la nad pa 'di sngon gyi tshul las gyur pa ci yod ces dris so/_/nad g.yog des smras pa/_sman pa chen po mi 'di ni sngon dkon mchog gsum dang /_lha rnams la dad cing bkur sti byed pa las da ni 'gyur te dad 
[\[316b.7\]]pa'i sems med par gyur to/_/sngon sbyin pa la dga' ba las da ni 'jungs par gyur to/_/sngon lto chung ba las da ni lto che bar gyur to/_/sngon 'jam zhing des pa las da ni khro zhing zhe sdang che bar gyur to/_/sngon sri zhu che zhing pha ma la ngo mtshar bkur sti byed pa las da ni pha ma la bkur 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]sti byed pa'i sems med par gyur to/_/sman pas de skad ces zer ba thos nas drung du bsnyen te mnams so/_/de la ud pa la'i dri bro'am/_a ga ru dang spos sna tshogs dang /_spos byid ka ta dang /_ta ka ra dang ta ma la dang gur gum dang tsan dan gyi dri bro ba dang /_sreg 
[\[317a.2\]]sha'i dri bro ba dang /_rgun chang bro ba dang rgyus pa dang /_rus pa sregs pa'i dri ltar mnam pa dang /_nya bro ba dang ngan skyugs bro ba ste/_de ltar dri zhim po dang mnam po gang bro ba rig nas lus la mnams te/_lus dar ram/_me tog ka pa la sha ltar mnyen zhing 'jam pa'am/_'on te rdo bzhin 
[\[317a.3\]]sra'am/_chab brom bzhin du grang ngam/_me bzhin du tsha'am/_bye ma bzhin du rtsub par gyur na/_de nas sman pa mkhas pa des de lta bu'i ltas rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas/_nad pa de gdon mi za bar 'chi bar shes mod kyi/_'on kyang mi 'di 'chi'o zhes pa'i tshig chad pa mi smra ste/_
[\[317a.4\]]nad g.yog la 'di skad du bdag deng brel ba zhig yod kyis sang 'ong ngo /_/ci dang ci 'dod pa ma dgag par byin cig ces smras nas phyir khyim du song ngo /_/de nas yang 'bod du 'ongs na sun ma la 'di skad du bdag gi las da dung ma zin pa'i steng du sman kyang ma sbyar ro zhes zer na mkhas 
[\[317a.5\]]pa shes rab can gyis ni nad pa de gdon mi za bar 'chi bar rig go/_/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyang de dang 'dra ste/_log sred can dag gi dbang po dang rang bzhin ji lta ba rab tu mkhyen pas de la yang chos ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te de dag la chos ma bstan na bus pa ma 
[\[317a.6\]]rabs thams cad 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa la ni byams pa dang snying rje chen po mi mnga'o/_/byams pa dang snying rje chen po mnga' ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ste/_byams pa dang snying rje med na ji ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes smra ba de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas log 
[\[317a.7\]]sred can dag la chos ston to/_/rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni na ba rnams gzigs na rtag tu chos kyi sman byin te/_nad pas mi 'thung gi de bzhin gshegs pas ma nyes so/_/rgyal po chen po log sred can dag rnam par phye na rnam pa gnyis te/_da ltar 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]gyi dus na dge ba'i rtsa ba thob pa dang /_phyi ma'i dus su dge ba'i rtsa ba thob pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas log sred can gang da ltar gyi dus su dge ba'i rtsa ba thob pa mkhyen pas de la chos ston to/_/phyi ma'i dus su thob par 'gyur ba la yang chos ston to/_/da ltar gyi dus 
[\[317b.2\]]su phan par mi 'gyur yang phyi ma'i dus kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pas log sred can la yang chos kyi gzhung ston to/_/log sred can zhes bya ba la yang rnam pa gnyis te/_dbang po rnon po dang dbang po 'bring po'o/_/dbang po rnon po ni da ltar gyi dus na dge 
[\[317b.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba thob pa'o/_/dbang po 'bring pos ni phyi ma'i dus su 'thob par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni don med par chos mi ston to/_/rgyal po chen po dper na mi gtsang ma zhig snam phyi sar lhung nas grogs po mdza' bo zhig gis mthong ba dang /_skra las 
[\[317b.4\]]bzung ste phyir phyung ngo /_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang sems can dag ngan song gsum du lhung bar gzigs na thabs kyis bskyed cing dbyung bar mdzad do/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas log sred can thams cad la chos ston to/_/rgyal pos 'tsho 
[\[317b.5\]]byed la smras pa/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par de lta bu yin par bden na lta/_sang nyi ma bzang po dang skar ma bzang po bltas te gdod 'dong ngo /_/'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos la ni nyi ma dang skar ma bzang ngan ces bya ba 
[\[317b.6\]]med do/_/rgyal po chen po dper na nad pa tshabs po che la yang nyi ma dang skar ma dang dus bzang ngan ces bya ba lta ba med de/_sman pa mkhas pa don du gnyer ro/_/rgyal po yang nad tshabs po ches btab pa dang 'dra ste/_sman pa de bzhin gshegs pa gnyer ba la nyi ma dang dus bzang ngan lta 
[\[317b.7\]]ba'i mi rigs so/_/rgyal po chen po dper na tsan dan gyi me dang /_e raN+Da'i me ni gnyi ga tshig pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dra ste tha dad pa med do/_/nyi ma bzang po dang ngan pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_gal te sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin na sdig pa kun 'byang bar 'gyur gyis/_rgyal po chen 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]po de ring nyid myur du gshegs par smon to/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po bkra shis zhes bya ba bkug nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'di ltar rig par gyis shig_/bdag deng sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro yis myur du mchod pa'i yo byad dang 
[\[318a.2\]]dgos so cog sbyor cig_/blon pos gsol pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/_/yo byad ci bzhed do 'tshal thams cad mchis so/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra btsun mo dang bcas te shing rta rab tu brgyan pa khri nyis stong dang /_bal glang bzang zhing rab tu che ba lnga khri yang 
[\[318a.3\]]chas so/_/bal glang de re re'i steng yang mi gsum gsum zhon te/_gdugs dang ba dan dang me tog dang spos dang rol mo'i cha byad thogs te/_mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs ma 'byor pa med do/_/rta ba'i tshogs khri phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_yul dbus 'gyur 'chang na gnas pa'i 
[\[318a.4\]]mi khri phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad snyed kyang rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring du chas so/_/de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer na 'khor mang po dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar gang ba kun gyis rgyang ma nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor dang bcas te 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang 
[\[318a.5\]]po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'da' ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po ma skyes dgras gal te 'tsho byed kyi ngag ma mnyan na/_zla ba phyi 
[\[318a.6\]]ma tshes zhag bdun la gdon mi za bar tshe'i dus byas nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/de bas na nye ba'i rgyur gyur pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'da' ba med do/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgra lam du zhugs pa na yang 'di skad ces thos so/_/yul mnyan du yod pa'i 
[\[318a.7\]]rgyal po bai dUr+ya zhes bya ba grur zhugs te rgya mtshor zhugs pa yang mes tshig go/_/dge slong ku ka ri gson por sar nub ste mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar lhung ngo /_/su na tsa ta zhes bya ba mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin pa dang /_sdig pa thams 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]cad byang bar gyur to zhes de skad du smras pa thos nas 'tsho byed la smras pa/_bdag deng de lta bu'i tshig rnam pa gnyis thos mod kyi 'on kyang bden nam mi bden pa yid mi ches kyis 'tsho byed khyod tshur shog_/kho bo dang bal glang gcig la zhon par dga'o/_/gal te kho bo mtshams med pa'i 
[\[318b.2\]]sems can dmyal bar lhung na/_khyod kyis kho bo ltung bar mi 'gyur bar zung shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag sngon 'di skad du lam thob pa'i mi ni sems can dmyal bar mi 'gro'o zhes thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ma 
[\[318b.3\]]skyes dgra da dung du the tshom gyi sems dang bcas kyis de'i sems gdon mi za bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom 
[\[318b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar chos thams cad ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/'di lta ste/_gzugs ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du yang ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes gsungs na/_de bzhin gshegs pas de ci'i slad du rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems nges 
[\[318b.5\]]par mdzad do zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/ngas deng nges par rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems nges par mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang rgyal po'i the tshom gyis sems gzhig tu rung ba zhig yin na/_chos thams cad kyang nges pa'i 
[\[318b.6\]]mtshan nyid med pa yin par rig par bya ste/_de'i phyir ngas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems nges par mdzad pa'i sems de nyid nges pa med pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te rgyal po de'i sems nges pa zhig yin na/_rgyal po de'i mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba 'jig tu mi rung ngo /_/nges 
[\[318b.7\]]pa med pas na kha na ma tho ba de 'jig tu rung ngo /_/de bas na ngas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems nges par mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po sA la'i shing drung sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la bltas na/_gser 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]g.ya' dag pa'i ri bo dang 'dra bar mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyangs rnam pa brgyad phyung ste/_rgyal po chen po zhes bos pa dang /_de'i tshe ma skyes dgras phan tshun du bltas te 'khor mang po 'di'i nang na rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba su yin/_bdag ni sdig lci 
[\[319a.2\]]ba'i steng du yon tan med pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po chen po zhes gsung ba'i mi rigs so snyam sems so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas yang rgyal po chen po ma skyes dgra zhes bos so/_/de nas rgyal pos thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/_'di snyam du de 
[\[319a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pas deng bdag bos te gsung bas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i thugs rje chen po thams cad la khyad par med par mnyam mo snyam nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag deng the tshom gyi sems 
[\[319a.4\]]lhag ma tsam yang ma lus par de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston pa bla na med pa yang dag par lags par shin tu rtogs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dzin la smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po ma 
[\[319a.5\]]skyes dgra'i sems nges par mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag deng tshangs pa'am brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dang lhan cig mchis shing 'tshal ma lhan cig 'tshal bar gyur kyang dga' ba ma lags te/_
[\[319a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dang mjal nas gsung gcig gis smras pas rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras snga nas bshams pa'i gdugs dang /_ba dan dang me tog dang spos dang rol mo la sogs pas mchod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_g.yas 
[\[319a.7\]]phyogs su lan gsum bskor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod la dam pa'i chos kyi gzhung bstan gyis shin tu yid la bya zhing brtags par nyon cig_/bus pa ma rabs rtag tu sems rtse gcig tu lus 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]la rtag pa'i dngos po rnam pa nyi shu yod do/_/'di lta ste/_bdag gi lus 'di ni gso ba gsog lta bu ste/_zag pa med pa ma yin pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams med pa dang /_bdag gi 'khor bar 'khor ba 'di ma dul ba dang /_shin tu g.yang sar lhung ste kun nas 'jigs pa dang /_thabs ji lta bu 
[\[319b.2\]]zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong ba dang /_ji ltar ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong ba dang /_'khor ba ni rtag tu sdug bsngal ba ste rtag pa dang bde ba dang bdag dang yongs su dag pa med pa dang /_mi khom pa brgyad spang dka' ba dang /_'khon du 'gyur ba'i dgras shin tu 
[\[319b.3\]]gtse ba dang /_srid pa las zlog pa'i chos gcig tsam yang med pa dang /_ngan song gsum las grol bar ma gyur pa dang /_mi dge ba ngan par lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga las rgal ba'i tshogs ma bsags pa dang /_'khor ba ni mthar thug pa med de mthar ma phyin 
[\[319b.4\]]no zhes bya ba dang /_las rnams ma byas na 'bras bu mi 'thob pa dang /_bdag byas pas 'bras bu gzhan gyis myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_bde ba'i rgyu ma byas na bde ba'i 'bras bu med pa dang /_las byas kyang 'bras bu rnams mi stor ba dang /_ma rig pa'i rgyu las skyes te ma rig pa'i rgyus 'chi ba 
[\[319b.5\]]dang /_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar rtag tu le lo spyod pa dang nyi shu'o/_/rgyal po chen po bus pa ma rabs so so'i skye bos rtag tu lus 'di la rtog pa rnam pa nyi shu po de dag gis brtag go/_/de ltar brtags nas 'khor ba la mi dga' bar 'gyur/_'khor ba la mi dga' bas lhag mthong 
[\[319b.6\]]dang zhi gnas thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rim gyis sems dang /_skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_'gog pa'i mtshan nyid brtag go/_/rim gyis sems dang /_skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'gog pa'i mtshan nyid rtog pa ltar ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_brtson 
[\[319b.7\]]'grus dang /_tshul khrims kyang de bzhin no/_/skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'gog pa rtogs nas/_sems kyi mtshan nyid nas tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid kyi bar du rab tu shes na nams kyang mi dge ba mi byed de 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs pa med do/_gal 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]te sems rtse gcig tu dngos po rnam pa nyi shu po de dag la ma brtags na le lo dang dregs pa'i sems skye ste/_mi dge ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_
[\[320a.2\]]bdag sngon dngos po rnam pa nyi shu po de dag la ma brtags pas mi dge ba mang po bgyis so/_/mi dge ba mang po bgyis pas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs pa mchis par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bdag la 'khus te/_sdig lci ba 'di lta bu bgyis 
[\[320a.3\]]so/_/yab rgyal po nongs pa ma mchis par bkum mo/_/dngos po nyi shu po de dag rtogs kyang rung /_ma rtogs kyang rung ste/_gdon mi 'tshal bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po chos 
[\[320a.4\]]thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid ni mi rtag pa dang ma nges pa yin na ci ste rgyal po khyod gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhes smra/_rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ma nges pa'i mtshan 
[\[320a.5\]]nyid lags na/_bdag gis bsad pa'i kha na ma tho ba yang ma nges pa lags sam/_gal te bsad pa nges pa zhig lags na chos thams cad kyang ma nges pa ma lags par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[320a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes gsungs la/_rgyal po nyid kyang bsad pa ni ma nges par shes te/_de bas na bsad pa ni ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa ltar yab rgyal po nyes pa med par 
[\[320a.7\]]bsad do zhes bya ba de/_de la pha zhes bya ba gang yin/_sems can gyi phung po lnga la pha'o zhes 'du shes bskyed de tha snyad du btags pa tsam du zad na/_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la pha zhes bya ba gang yin/_gal te gzugs pha yin na phung po bzhi ma gtogs so/_/
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]gal te phung po bzhi pha yin na gzugs kyang ma gtogs so/_/gal te gzugs dang gzugs ma yin pa 'dus pa las phar gyur pa de ni gnas ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs dang gzugs ma yin pa rang bzhin gyis bsdur mi rung ba'i phyir ro/_/rgyal po chen po sems can 
[\[320b.2\]]ma rabs ni gzugs kyi phung po la log par phar 'du shes bskyed de/_de ltar gzugs kyi phung po de yang gsad du rung ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs la rnam pa bcu ste rnam pa bcu po de dag la gzugs gcig pu ni bltar rung /_gzung du rung /_btsal du rung /_dpag tu 
[\[320b.3\]]rung /_khrid du rung /_bcing du rung ste/_de ltar blta ba dang bcing du yang rung yang rang bzhin gyis mi gnas so/_/de ltar mi gnas pas bltar med/_gzung du med/_gzhal du med/_bkrir med/_bcing du med do/_/gzugs kyi mtshan nyid de ltar bas na ji ltar gsad du rung /_gal te gzugs 
[\[320b.4\]]pha yin te/_gsad du rung gnod par byar rung ste sdig pa smin par 'gyur na/_lhag ma dgu ma gtogs par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste dgu ma gtogs na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig kyang med do/_/rgyal po chen po gzugs la rnam pa gsum ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi'o/_/'das pa dang /_
[\[320b.5\]]da ltar gyi ni gsad du mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'das pa ni sngar 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/da ltar gyi ni skad cig skad cig mar 'gog pa'i phyir ro/_/ma 'ongs pa dgag pa'i phyir gsod pa zhes bya ste/_de ltar gzugs rnam pa gcig las/_la la ni gsad du rung /_la la ni gsad du med do/_/
[\[320b.6\]]gsad du yod pa dang gsad du med pas na gzugs la nges pa med do/_/de ltar na gzugs la nges pa med pas gsod pa yang nges pa med do/_/gsod pa la nges pa med pas rnam par smin pa la yang nges pa med na ci ste gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar ltung zhes smra/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[320b.7\]]sems can thams cad sdig pa'i las byed do cog la rnam pa gnyis te/_yang ba dang lci ba'o/_/de la yid dang ngag gis byas pa ni yang ba'o/_/lus dang ngag dang sems dang yid kyis byas pa ni lci ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po sems kyis bsams/_ngag gis brjod de lus kyis ma byas na byas 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]so cog gi rnam par smin pa yang ba'o/_/rgyal po chen pos sngon sod cig ces ni ma bsgo'i/_rkang pa chod cig ces bsgo la/_rgyal po chen pos gal te 'greng ste/_blon po la rgyal po'i mgo chod cig ces bsgo ba la 'dug pa'i tshe gdod bcad na 'on kyang sdig par mi 'gyur na/_rgyal pos 
[\[321a.2\]]ma bsgo bar sdig par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_gal te rgyal pos sdig thob na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang sdig 'thob bo/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod kyi pha rgyal po gzugs can snying po rtag tu sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun te de'i phyir rgyal po'i thabs thob bo/_/gal te sangs rgyas 
[\[321a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa ma bzhes na rgyal por mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te rgyal por ma gyur na khyod kyis yul srid kyi phyir rgyal po gsad du med do/_/ci ste khyod kyis pha bsad pas sdig par 'gyur ba zhig yin na/_nga la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang sdig pa thob 
[\[321a.4\]]pa'i rigs so/_/gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sdig par mi 'gyur na/_khyod gcig pu ci ste sdig pa thob par 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po rgyal po gzugs can snying po sngon phyi bo la'i ri la rgyu zhing [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du chas pa las dbye dgon pa kun tu byugs na ci yang ma rnyed de drang srong mngon 
[\[321a.5\]]par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gcig cig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas zhe sdang gi sems skyes te/_deng [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor ba las ci yang ma rnyed pa ni mi 'di'i phyir ro snyam nas ri las ded de g.yog rnams la sod cig ces bsgo'o/_/drang srong de'i tshe'i dus byed pa na khro ba'i sems skyes pas rdzu 'phrul stor te/_yi 
[\[321a.6\]]dam 'di skad du nga nyes pa med par khyod kyis yid dang ngag gis nan gyis bsad pa ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ngas kyang 'di ltar yid dang ngag gis khyod bsad do zhes dam bcas so/_/de'i tshe rgyal pos thos nas 'gyod pa'i sems skyes te ro la mchod pa byas so/_/rgyal po de de ltar byas pas nyes pa yang 
[\[321a.7\]]yang bar gyur te sems can dmyal bar ma ltung na/_rgyal pos ni de ltar ma byas par sems can dmyal ba'i 'bras bu smin pa lta ci smos/_sngon rgyal po gzugs can snying po bdag gis byas pas bdag myong ba yin na ci ste rgyal pos gsod pa'i sdig 'thob par 'gyur/_ji ltar rgyal pos pha 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]rgyal po nyes pa med do zhes bya ba de ji ltar na nyes pa med ces byar rung /_gang sdig pa dang bcas pa ni sdig pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin no/_/gang dge ba'i las byed pa ni sdig pa'i las rnam par smin pa yang med do/_/khyod kyi pha rgyal po gal te sdig pa med pa zhig na ci ste las rnam par smin par 'gyur/_
[\[321b.2\]]gzugs can snying po da ltar gyi dus su dge ba'i 'bras bu thob la mi dge ba'i 'bras bu yang thob ste/_de'i phyir rgyal po snga ma ni ma nges pa'o/_/de ltar ma nges pas na bsad pa yang ma nges so/_/bsad pa ma nges pa yin na ci ste nges par sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo zhes smra/_sems can rnams ni myos pa 
[\[321b.3\]]dang bsad pa la rnam pa bzhi ste/_'dod pas myos pa dang /_sman gyis myos pa dang /_sngags kyis myos pa dang /_sngon gyi las kyi rkyen gyis myos pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po nga'i nye gnas kyi nang na yang myos pa bzhi po dang bcas pa yod de mi dge ba mang du byas kyang de tshul khrims bshig pa yin no zhes lung mi ston to/_/
[\[321b.4\]]de dag gis ci byas kyang ngan song gsum du mi 'gro la/_gal te phyir dran par gyur na tshul khrims nyams pa zhes mi bya'o/_/rgyal po yang srid dang yul 'dod pa'i phyir rgyal po pha bsad pa ni 'dod pas myos pa'i sems kyis byas pa yin na ci ste sdig par 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po dper na mi zhig chang gis myos 
[\[321b.5\]]nas ma bsad do/_/sangs par gyur pa dang rab tu 'gyod pa'i sems skyes na las de ni rnam par smin pa ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/rgyal po yang 'dod pas myos pa'i phyir byas kyi/_dran bzhin du byas pa ni ma yin no/_/de ltar dran bzhin du byas pa ma yin na ci ste kha na ma tho ba'i sdig 'thob par 'gyur/_rgyal po 
[\[321b.6\]]chen po dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis lam gyi bzhi mdor sgyu ma'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_bal glang dang /_rta dang /_se mo do dang /_gos la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa la bus pa glen pa gti mug can gyis yang dag pa bden pa yin par 'dzin to/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni yang dag pa'i bden 
[\[321b.7\]]pa ma yin par rig ste/_de bzhin du gsod pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_bus pa ma rabs so so'i skye bo dag ni yang dag par yod par 'dzin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni yang dag pa ma yin par rig go/_/rgyal po chen po dper na brag ca la gti mug can gyis sgra yang dag par 'dzin to/_/mkhas pa shes 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]rab can gyis ni yang dag par ma yin par rig ste/_gsod pa yang de dang 'dra bar bus pa ma rabs so so'i skye bo yang dag par 'dzin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni yang dag pa ma yin par rig go/_/rgyal po chen po dper na dgra zhig sgyus nye bar 'ong ba la gti mug can gyis ni yang 
[\[322a.2\]]dag par nye bar 'dzin to/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni sgyu ma yin par shes so/_/gsod pa yang de dang 'dra ste bus pa so so skye bos ni yang dag par 'dzin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni yang dag pa ma yin par rig go/_/rgyal po chen po ji ltar me long las bdag gi ngo snang ba la gti mug 
[\[322a.3\]]can gyis yang dag par ngo yin par 'dzin to/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni rab tu rtogs pas yang dag pa ma yin par rig go/_/gsod pa yang de dang 'dra ste bus pa ma rabs so so'i skye bos ni yang dag par 'dzin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni yang dag pa ma yin par rig go/_/rgyal po 
[\[322a.4\]]chen po dper na smig rgyu la gti mug can gyis ni chu yin par 'dzin to/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni rab tu rtogs te chu ma yin par shes so/_/gsod pa yang de dang 'dra ste bus pa ma rabs so so skye bos ni yang dag par 'dzin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni yang dag pa ma yin par rig go/_/
[\[322a.5\]]rgyal po chen po dper na dri za'i grong khyer la glen pa gti mug can gyis ni yang dag par 'dzin to/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni rab tu rtogs te yang dag pa ma yin par shes so/_/gsod pa yang de dang 'dra ste bus pa ma rabs so so skye bos ni yang dag par 'dzin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 
[\[322a.6\]]yang dag pa ma yin par rig go/_/rgyal po chen po dper na rmi lam gyi nang na 'dod pa lnga'i dga' ba myong ba la gti mug can gyis ni yang dag par 'dzin to/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis rab tu rtogs te yang dag pa ma yin par shes so/_/gsod pa yang de dang 'dra ste bus pa ma rabs kyis ni yang dag par 
[\[322a.7\]]'dzin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni yang dag pa ma yin par rig go/_/rgyal po chen po gsod pa'i chos dang /_gsod pa'i las dang /_gsod pa dang /_gsod pa'i 'bras bu dang /_rnam par grol ba'i bar du kha na ma tho ba'i las med par ngas gsal bar rtogs so/_/rgyal po chen pos gsod pa 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]shes pa tsam gyis ci'i phyir sdig par 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po dper na mi zhig chang bdag byed pa de/_ci ste ma 'thungs na myos par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du me la dbang ba yang tshig par mi 'gyur ba ltar/_rgyal po yang de dang 'dra ste gsod par shes pa tsam gyis na ci'i phyir sdig par 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po sems 
[\[322b.2\]]can kha cig nyi ma shar ba na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang /_zla ba shar ba na chom po dang rkun shod byed do/_/nyi ma dang zla ba ma shar na sdig pa mi byed de/_de ltar nyi ma dang zla ba'i rkyen gyis sdig pa byed kyang zla ba dang nyi ma de la yang dag par na sdig pa med do/_/gsod pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_rgyal po'i rkyen 
[\[322b.3\]]gyis de ltar gyur kyang rgyal po la ni yang dag par sdig pa med do/_/rgyal po chen po ji ltar rgyal po'i khab na/_rtag tu lug gsod du bcug kyang /_thog ma nas 'jigs pa'i sems med na/_ci ste pha 'ba' zhig la 'jigs pa'i sems skye/_rgyal po chen po ji ltar mi dang byol song la rim pa'i khyad par yod kyang srog la 
[\[322b.4\]]chags pa dang phangs pa la ni gnyis ka tha dad pa med na/_ci ste lug la ni sems bag yangs su 'jigs pa med la/_pha rgyal po la ni rab tu mi dge ba'i mya ngan skyed/_rgyal po chen po 'jig rten pa ni 'dod pa'i khol por gyur te dbang med par gyur to/_/'dod pas bkol ba'i phyir gsod pa'i las byed do/_/
[\[322b.5\]]gal te de la 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod na 'dod pa la sdig par 'gyur te/_rgyal po la dbang med pas ci'i phyir nyes par 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po dper na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin te/_yod pa yang yin no/_/gsod pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_yod pa yang ma yin/_med 
[\[322b.6\]]pa yang ma yin mod kyi/_yod par yang 'gyur ro/_/khrel ba dang 'dzem pa yod pa la ni yod pa ma yin/_khrel ba dang 'dzem pa med pa la ni med pa yang ma yin no/_/'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong ba ni yod pa zhes bya'o/_/stong par lta ba la ni yod pa ma yin yod par lta ba la ni med pa ma yin/_yod par lta ba la ni yod pa zhes 
[\[322b.7\]]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yod par lta ba dang bcas pa ni 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang yod do/_/yod par lta ba med pa la ni 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med do/_/rtag par lta ba la ni yod pa ma yin mi rtag par lta ba la ni med pa ma yin/_rtag pa rtag par lta ba la ni med pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rtag pa rtag par lta ba 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]la ni mi dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yod de de'i phyir rtag pa rtag par lta ba la med pa zhes byar mi rung ngo /_/de bas yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin mod kyi/_yod pa yang ma yin no/_/rgyal po chen po sems can zhes bya ba ni phyi nang gi dbugs rgyu ba'o/_/dbugs rgyu ba gcod pa ni gsod pa zhes 
[\[323a.2\]]bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang 'jig rten pa'i rjes su gsod pa zhes kyang gsungs so/_/rgyal po chen po gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/_gzugs kyi rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba yang mi rtag go/_/mi rtag pa'i rgyu las skyes na gzugs ci ste rtag_/rnam par shes pa mi rtag pas na rnam par shes pa'i rten 
[\[323a.3\]]cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i bar du yang mi rtag pa ste/_de ltar mi rtag pa'i rgyu las skyes na rnam par shes pa ci ste rtag_/de ltar mi rtag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal lo/_/sdug bsngal ba'i phyir stong pa'o/_/stong pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o/_/gal te mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa yin na ci 
[\[323a.4\]]zhig gis ci gsod par 'gyur mi rtag pa bsad na rtag pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob la/_sdug bsngal bsad na bde ba 'thob/_stong pa bsad na bden pa 'thob/_bdag med pa bsad na yang dag pa'i bdag 'thob bo/_/rgyal po chen po gang mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa gsod 
[\[323a.5\]]pa ni nga dang 'dra'o/_/nga yang mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa bsad de sems can dmyal bar ma song na khyod ci ste 'gro/_de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar gzugs brtag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du brtags te/_de ltar rtogs nas bcom 
[\[323a.6\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzod gzugs mi rtag pa nas/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi rtag pa lags par 'tshal to/_/bdag gis gal te sngar de ltar 'tshal na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[323a.7\]]ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu sems can gyi pha ma mdzad do zhes thos te/_de skad thos kyang nges par ma rtogs te/_deng gzod nges par rtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yang 'di skad ces thos te/_ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni rin po che sna bzhi las byas te/_'di ltar gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel lo/_/
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]gal te phyogs gang du bya mang po 'dus pa de dag kha dog de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes thos kyang nges par ma rtogs te/_bdag deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri rab kyi drung du phyin nas kha dog mtshungs par gyur to/_/de la kha dog mtshungs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba stong pa bdag med par 
[\[323b.2\]]shes par mtshungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'jig rten na/_e raN+Da'i 'bras bu las e raN+Da'i sdong po skye bar mthong gi/_e raN+Da'i 'bras bu las tsan dan gyi sdong po skye bar ma mthong ste/_bdag gis deng gzod e raN+Da'i 'bras bu las tsan dan gyi sdong po skyes pa mthong ngo /_/de la 
[\[323b.3\]]e raN+Da'i 'bras bu ni bdag gi lus so/_/tsan dan gyi sdong po ni bdag gi sems dad pa'i rtsa ba ma mchis pa'o/_/rtsa ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni bdag sngon de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti bgyi bar mi 'tshal/_chos dang dge 'dun la ma dad de/_de ni rtsa ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom 
[\[323b.4\]]ldan 'das bdag gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang ma phrad na bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal tshad med pa snyed myong bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag gis deng sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur te/_sangs rgyas mthong ba'i bsod nams ji snyed thob pa des/_
[\[323b.5\]]sems can gyi nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i sems thams cad choms par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/_/ngas deng khyod gdon mi za bar sems can gyi mi dge ba'i sems choms par mkhyen to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag de ltar 
[\[323b.6\]]brtags par sems can gyi mi dge ba'i sems rnams choms par 'gyur na lta/_gal te bdag rtag tu sems can dmyal bar mchis te/_sems can rnams kyi phyir bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du sdug bsngal chen po len yang sdug bsngal bar mi 'dzin to/_/de nas de'i tshe yul dbus 'gyur 'chang gi mi 
[\[323b.7\]]tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de ltar tshad med pa de dag gi sems rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sdig lci ba yang bar gyur nas rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_slas la sogs pa kun gyis cig car bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'tsho byed la smras pa/_'tsho byed bdag ma shi bar lha'i lus thob ste/_tshe thung ba spangs nas tshe ring bar gyur/_mi rtag pa'i lus spangs nas rtag pa'i lus thob bo/_/de ni sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[324a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems skyed par byed pa ste/_da ni lha'i lus tshe ring ba rtag pa yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nye gnas yin no/_/de skad ces smras nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_rol mo 
[\[324a.3\]]dam pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do/_/tshig bden shin tu dam pa de/_/tshig dang don la rab mkhas pa/_/zab mo gsang ba'i snying po yang /_/mang po kun la gsal bar ston/_/rgya che 'byam klas tshig rnams kyang /_/bsdus te 'khor la mdo tsam ston/_/de 
[\[324a.4\]]lta bu yi tshig dang ldan/_/sems can nad gso ba la mkhas/_/gal te sems can rnams gang gis/_/tshig de thos par gyur pa de/_/dad pa rnams dang ma dad pa/_/sangs rgyas gsung ba yin par rtogs/_/sangs rgyas gsung ni 'jam pa ste/_/'khor la rtsub pa'i tshig kyang gsung /_/'jam dang rtsub por gang gsungs 
[\[324a.5\]]pa/_/gnyis ka don dam lags pas na/_/de phyir bdag kyang de ring 'dir/_/bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi/_/bcom ldan gsung ni ro gcig ste/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu dang mtshungs/_/bden pa dam pa zhes bya ste/_/don med pa yi tshig ma mchis/_/de ring de bzhin gshegs pa yis/_/tshad med chos rnams rab 
[\[324a.6\]]bstan pa/_/skyes pa bud med thos pa dang /_/'thun par don dam thob par 'gyur/_/rgyu med 'bras bu yang med de/_/skye ba med cing 'gog pa med/_/de ni mya ngan 'das pa ste/_/thos pas rnam smin 'joms par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs ni thams cad kyi/_/shin tu byams pa'i pha ma mdzad/_/sems can so so'i skye 
[\[324a.7\]]bo dag_/de bzhin gshegs kyi sras su rig_/bcom ldan byams pa'i thugs rje yis/_/mang po'i phyir ni dka' ba mdzad/_/ji ltar gdon gyis brlams pa ltar/_/smyos nas rnam pa mang po byed/_/bdag gis bcom ldan deng mthong ba'i/_/dge bar gyur pa'i las gsum po'i/_/bsod nams ji snyed thob pa 'di/_/
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]bla med byang chub la bsngo'o/_/bdag gis deng 'dir sangs rgyas dang /_/chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa'i/_/bsod nams ji snyed bskyed pa de/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum/_/rtag tu 'jig rten gnas par shog_/bdag gis deng 'dir 'di nyid du/_/bsod nams ji snyed 
[\[324b.2\]]thob gyur pa/_/bsod nams de yis sems can gyi/_/bdud bzhi rab tu zhigs par shog_/mi dge'i bshes dang bdag phrad pas/_/dus gsum sdig pa gang bgyis pa/_/deng 'dir spyan sngar kun kyang bshags/_/slan chad sdig pa mi bgyid do/_/sems can so so'i skye bo dag_/
[\[324b.3\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad la/_/rtse gcig sems kyis dran par shog_/gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi/_/nyon mongs mang po yongs bcom nas/_/ji ltar 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar/_/sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong bar shog_/
[\[324b.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/gal te gang zhig byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/_sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po khyod sngon sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs las byang 
[\[324b.5\]]chub tu sems bskyed de/_de nas nga 'jig rten du byung ba'i bar du sems can dmyal bar ltung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar ma gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_byang chub kyi sems ni de lta bu'i 'bras bu tshad med pa snyed yod do/_/rgyal po chen po deng phyin chad 
[\[324b.6\]]kyang rtag tu byang chub kyi sems la brtson par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rgyu/_de'i rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba'i las tshad med pa snyed 'byang ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra yul dbus 'gyur 'chang gi mi dang bcas su 'dug pa las langs nas bcom 
[\[324b.7\]]ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor te/_phyir pho brang du dong ngo /_/lhas spyod pa'i le'u ni me tog sna tshogs kyi mdo las bshad pa bzhin no/_/'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las/_tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]rigs kyi bu ji ltar na bus pa chung ngu'i spyod pa zhe na/_rigs kyi bu ldang ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_'ong ba dang /_song ba dang /_smra mi nus pa ni bus pa chung ngu zhes bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/ldang mi nus pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang 
[\[325a.2\]]chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid las mi ldang ngo /_/'dug mi nus pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos thams cad la ma chags pa'o/_/'ong mi nus pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spyod pa mi g.yo ba'o/_/'gro mi nus pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[325a.3\]]pa chen po mthar phyin pa'o/_/smra mi nus pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad la chos rnams ston kyang yang dag par na ston pa med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji snyed du ston pa yod pa ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'dus byas 
[\[325a.4\]]ma yin pas de'i phyir bshad pa med do/_/yang mi smra ba ni ji ltar bus pa chung ngu tshig gsal bar mi shes pa smra ba yod du zin kyang yang dag par na smra ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_smra ba mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 
[\[325a.5\]]dgongs te gsungs pa'o/_/gsungs pa yod du zin kyang sems can gyis mi shes pas mi smra ba zhes bya'o/_/yang bus pa zhes bya ba'i ni tshig yang dag par mi shes pa'i phyir rdzas la ming gcig tu ma chad do/_/tshig yang dag par mi shes pas rdzas la ming gcig tu ma chad 
[\[325a.6\]]kyang /_rgyu de ma yin pa'i logs shig na rdzas shes pa 'gyur ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_sems can thams cad kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pas tshig mi 'thun te/_de bzhin gshegs pas thabs kyis ji lta ba de ltar ston pas de'i 
[\[325a.7\]]rgyus thams cad shes par yang mdzad do/_/yang bus pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge chen po 'ba' zhig ston nus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra bar yi ge chen po ston to/_/'di lta ste/_ba hwA zhes bya'o/_/de la hwA zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas so/_/ba zhes bya ba ni 'dus 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]ma byas te/_de ni bus pa zhes bya'o/_/hwA zhes bya ba ni nga mi rtag pa'o/_/ba zhes bya ba zhes bya ni rtag pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang rtag pa 'chad de/_sems can thos nas nga chos rtag pa 'dod pa'i phyir mi rtag pa gcod de/_de ni bus pa'i spyod pa'o/_/yang bus pa ni 
[\[325b.2\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba dang /_nyin par dang /_mtshan mo dang /_pha ma mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang de dang 'dra ste/_sems can gyi phyir bde ba dang sdug bsngal mi mthong nyin par dang mtshan mo zhes bya ba med/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[325b.3\]]sems mnyam pa'i phyir pha dang ma dang gnyen la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid med do/_/yang bus pa ni las chen po dang chung ngu rnams byed mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang de dang 'dra ste/_byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba'i las mi byed pas mi byed pa 
[\[325b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/dngos po chen po zhes bya ba ni mtshams med pa lnga ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni nams kyang mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig lci ba mi byed do/_/dngos po chung ngu zhes bya ba ni theg pa gnyis pa'i sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' nams kyang 
[\[325b.5\]]byang chub kyi sems las log ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par mi ltung ngo /_/yang byis pa'i spyod pa ni ji ltar bus pa de ngu ba na/_pha mas lcang ma'i lo ma ser po byin te/_'di skad du bu ma ngu shig ma ngu shig_/ngas khyod la gser sbyin zhes byas nas bus pas de mthong 
[\[325b.6\]]ba dang gser yang dag pa'i 'du shes bskyed de mi ngu bar gyur te/_lcang ma'i lo ma de ni yang dag par gser ma yin no/_/gal te shing la byas pa'i glang dang /_rta dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med la bus pas mthong nas skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa yin pa'i 'du shes bskyed 
[\[325b.7\]]de mi ngu'o/_/de skyes pa dang bud med ma yin par skyes pa dang bud med kyi 'du shes 'jog pa'i phyir bus pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_gal te sems can dag mi dge ba mang po byed na/_de bzhin gshegs pas sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_byad bzang ba dang /_longs spyod dang /_gzhal med khang bzang po'i nang na 'dod pa lnga spyod pa dang /_dbang po drug gi gnyen po thams cad bde ba dang dga' ba sha stag yin par 
[\[326a.2\]]bstan te/_sems can gyis de lta bu'i bde ba yod pa thos nas bde ba la chags pa'i sems skyes te/_mi dge ba btang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi las dge ba la brtson no/_/de ni yang dag par 'khor ba yin te/_mi rtag pa/_bde ba med pa/_bdag med pa/_
[\[326a.3\]]yongs su dag pa ma yin yang sems can sgrol ba'i phyir thabs kyis rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/yang bus pa zhes bya ba ni/_gal te sems can gang 'khor ba la rab tu skyo ba na de bzhin gshegs pas theg pa 
[\[326a.4\]]gnyis ston te/_de la yang dag par theg pa gnyis po'i bden pa med kyang theg pa gnyis kyi phyir 'khor ba'i skyon shes shing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong ba'i phyir rang gis gcod pa dang /_mi gcod pa dang /_bden pa dang mi bden pa 
[\[326a.5\]]dang /_spyod pa dang mi spyod pa dang /_thob pa dang mi thob pa'i dngos po rig par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar bus pa de gser ma yin pa la gser gyi 'du shes bskyed pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra bar yongs su ma dag pa la yongs su dag pa'o zhes 
[\[326a.6\]]'chad de/_de bzhin gshegs pas don dam pa thob pa'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin pa med do/_/ji ltar bus pa de ba lang dang rta ma yin pa la ba lang dang rtar 'du shes pa ltar/_gal te sems can gang lam ma yin pa la lam yang dag par 'du shes 'jog na/_de bzhin 
[\[326a.7\]]gshegs pas kyang lam ma yin pa la lam du 'chad de/_lam ma yin pa la yang dag par lam med mod kyi/_lam gyi rgyu cung zad bskyed nus pa'i phyir lam ma yin pa lam du 'chad do/_/ji ltar bus pa de shing gi khye'u dang bu mo la khye'u dang bu mor 'du shes pa ltar/_de bzhin 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra bar sems can ma yin par mkhyen bzhin du sems can gyi mtshan nyid 'chad de/_yang dag par na sems can gyi mtshan nyid med do/_/gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can med par 'chad na sems can thams cad ngan par 
[\[326b.2\]]lta bar ltung ste/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can yod par gsungs so/_/sems can las sems can du 'du shes 'jog pa ni sems can gyi mtshan nyid 'jig mi nus so/_/gang sems can las sems can gyi mtshan nyid 'jig pa ni yongs su mya 
[\[326b.3\]]ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob pa'i phyir mi ngu bar 'gyur te de ni bus pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te skyes pa'am bud med gang spyod pa lnga po 'di gzungs su 'dzin cing 'chang ngam/_klog gam 
[\[326b.4\]]yi ger bris sam/_dgrol zhing 'chad na gang zag des gdon mi za bar spyod pa lnga po de dag thob par rig par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 
[\[326b.5\]]'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_bdag kyang gdon mi 'tshal bar spyod pa lnga po de dag thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod 'ba' zhig gis spyod pa lnga po de dag thob pa ma yin gyi/_da lta 'khor 'di'i 
[\[326b.6\]]nang na mi khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa gsum yang khyod dang 'dra bar spyod pa lnga po de dag thob par gyur to/_/'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las/_bus pa chung ngu spyod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//'phags pa yongs su mya 
[\[326b.7\]]ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba mtho btsun dpal gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]dpa' chen po gang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo 'di la rnal 'byor du spyod na yon tan rnam pa bcu 'thob par 'gyur te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab ste thos pa tsam gyis ngo mtshar rmad du 'dzin la/_
[\[327a.2\]]nang ma yin/_phyi rol ma yin/_dka' ba ma yin/_sla ba ma yin/_mtshan nyid ma yin/_mtshan nyid ma yin pa ma yin/_'jig rten gyi chos ma yin te/_mtshan ma dang dbyibs med pa 'jig rten na mi srid pa'o/_/rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/_gcig la yang rnam pa lnga ste/_
[\[327a.3\]]lnga gang zhe na/_ma thos pa thos par 'gyur ba dang /_thos nas phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang /_the tsom dang nem nur gyi sems chod par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab la g.yo sgyu med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa'i don zab mo shes pa dang lnga'o/_/de 
[\[327a.4\]]la ma thos pa thos par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dgongs te gsungs pa'i don shin tu zab mo sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la khyad med pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin 
[\[327a.5\]]dang /_mtshan nyid rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad ni mtha' yun du mya ngan las 'das pa med de/_rtag pa/_gnas pa/_mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mya ngan 
[\[327a.6\]]las 'das pa ni yod pa ma yin/_med pa ma yin/_'dus byas pa ma yin/_'dus ma byas pa ma yin/_zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/_zag pa med pa ma yin/_gzugs ma yin/_gzugs ma yin pa ma yin/_ming ma yin/_ming ma yin pa ma yin/_mtshan nyid ma 
[\[327a.7\]]yin/_mtshan nyid ma yin pa ma yin/_yod pa ma yin/_med pa ma yin/_dngos po ma yin/_dngos po ma yin pa ma yin/_rgyu ma yin/_'bras bu ma yin/_ltos pa ma yin/_mi ltos pa ma yin/_snang ba ma yin/_mun pa ma yin/_byung ba ma yin/_ma byung ba ma 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]yin/_rtag pa ma yin/_mi rtag pa ma yin/_chad pa ma yin/_ma chad pa ma yin/_thog ma ma yin/_tha ma ma yin/_'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_da ltar ma yin/_phung po ma yin/_phung po ma yin pa ma yin/_skye mched ma yin/_skye mched ma yin 
[\[327b.2\]]pa ma yin/_khams ma yin/_khams ma yin pa'ang ma yin/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis ma yin/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis ma yin pa ma yin/_de dag la sogs pa'i chos dgongs te gsungs pa'i don shin tu zab mo sngon ma thos pa thos 
[\[327b.3\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan yang ma thos pa ni 'di lta ste/_mu stegs can thams cad kyi gtsug lag rim pa bzhi dang /_byA ka ra Na'i gtsug lag dang /_rgyal po'i gtsug lag dang /_bgrang ba dang /_brtsi ba'i gtsug lag la sogs pa dang /_rig sngags dang /_sman 
[\[327b.4\]]dpyad dang /_sgyu rtsal dang /_nyi zla spyang kis zin pa dang /_skar ma 'pho zhing 'gyur ba dang /_ri mo dang yi ge dang /_lung ston pa'i gtsug lag la sogs pa'i yi ge dang /_gtsug lag de'i gsang ba'i don sngon ma thos pa da mdo sde 'di las shes par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan 
[\[327b.5\]]yang shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde ma gtogs pa mdo sde bcu gcig las dgongs te gsungs pa'i don shin tu zab mo med pa yang deng mdo sde 'di'i rkyen gyis shes par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ni ma thos pa thos par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/thos nas phan par 'gyur ba zhes 
[\[327b.6\]]bya ba ni gal te mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo 'di yongs su 'dzin na/_shin tu rgyas pa theg pa chen po'i mdo'i don gyi ro shin tu zab mo thams cad rdzogs par kun shes par nus so/_/dper na khye'u 'am bu mo dag me long gsal ba'i nang na gzugs dang cha lugs 
[\[327b.7\]]gsal bar snang ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i me long yang de dang 'dra ste/_byang chub sems dpas thos na theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i don shin tu zab mo gsal bar mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang la la zhig mun khang gi nang du sgron ma chen po phyung na/_rdzas thams cad 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]mthong ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i sgron ma yang de dang 'dra ste/_byang chub sems dpas 'dzin na theg pa chen po'i don zab mo gsal dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ji ltar nyi ma shar ba na 'od snang ba stong yod pa des ri rnams kyi 
[\[328a.2\]]su la zab mo mun pa can kun snang bar byed de/_skye bo thams cad kyis rgyang ring po nas rdzas rnams mthong ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i yongs su dag pa'i shes rab kyi nyi ma yang de dang 'dra ste/_theg pa chen pos shin tu zab mo'i gnas snang bar byed de/_nyan thos 
[\[328a.3\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bas rgyang ring po nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mthong bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa mnyan cing 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar mya ngan 
[\[328a.4\]]las 'das pa chen po'i mdo nyan tam 'dzin na chos thams cad kyi rnam grangs rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/gal te yi ger bris sam/_klog gam/_'don tam/_khong du chud par byed dam/_gzhan la rgyas par ston tam/_don yid la byed na chos thams cad kyi 
[\[328a.5\]]don tshul bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang nyan cing 'dzin pa des ni rnam grangs 'ba' zhig shes kyi/_don 'di nyid mi rtogs so/_/gang yi ger bris sam/_gzungs su 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_'don tam/_gzhan la rgyas par ston 
[\[328a.6\]]tam/_don yid la byed na/_don nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di mnyan pas na sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod par thos kyi mthong bar ni mi nus so/_/yi ger bris shing klog gam/_'don tam/_gzhan la rgyas par ston 
[\[328a.7\]]tam/_don yid la byed na des ni mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mdo sde 'di mnyan pa tsam gyis sbyin pa thob par 'gyur gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ni ma yin no/_/mdo sde 'di yi ger bris shing 'don tam/_klog gam/_gzhan la yang rgyas 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]par ston tam/_don yid la byed na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo 'di mnyan na chos shes pa dang /_
[\[328b.2\]]don shes par 'gyur ro/_/so so yang dag par shes pa de gnyis dang ldan na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis rnam par 'byed cing don ston pa la 
[\[328b.3\]]'gal ba med pa dang /_gzhan las ma mnyan par rang gis rig pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ni thos nas phan par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/the tshom gyi sems chod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/_tshig 
[\[328b.4\]]la the tshom za ba dang /_don la the tshom za ba'o/_/mdo sde 'di mnyan pas tshig la the tshom za ba'i sems chod par 'gyur ro/_/don yid la byed pas ni don la the tshom za ba'i sems chod par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu the tshom la rnam pa lnga ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[328b.5\]]nges par mya ngan las 'da' 'am snyam the tshom za ba dang /_sangs rgyas rtag tu gnas pa yin nam snyam the tshom za ba dang /_sangs rgyas yang dag par bden pa yin nam snyam the tshom za ba dang /_sangs rgyas yang dag par yongs su dag pa yin nam snyam the tshom za ba dang /_
[\[328b.6\]]sangs rgyas yang dag par bdag yin nam snyam du the tshom za ba ste/_mdo sde 'di mnyan pas ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da' ba the tshom za ba yongs su chod par 'gyur ro/_/yi ger bris shing klog gam 'don tam/_gzhan la rgyas par ston tam/_don yid la byed 
[\[328b.7\]]pas ni the tshom lhag ma bzhi yongs su chod par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang the tshom la rnam pa gsum ste/_nyan thos yod pa yin nam med pa yin snyam the tshom za ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas yod pa yin nam med pa yin snyam the tshom za ba dang /_sangs rgyas yod 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]pa yin nam med pa yin snyam the tshom za ba ste/_mdo sde 'di mnyan pa tsam gyis the tshom rnam pa gsum ma lus par med par 'gyur ro/_/yi ger bris shing klog gam 'don tam/_gzhan la rgyas par ston tam/_don yid la byed pas ni sems can 
[\[329a.2\]]thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod par rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gal te sems can gang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di ma thos na the tshom gyi sems mang ba ni 'di lta ste/_rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_mi bde ba 
[\[329a.3\]]'am/_yongs su dag pa'am/_yongs su ma dag pa'am/_bdag gam/_bdag med pa'am/_srog gam/_srog ma yin nam/_sems can nam/_sems can ma yin nam/_mthar thug gam/_mthar ma thug gam/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus sam/_'das pa'i 
[\[329a.4\]]dus sam/_yod pa'am/_med pa'am/_sdug bsngal lam/_sdug bsngal ma yin nam/_kun 'byung ngam/_kun 'byung ma yin nam/_lam mam/_lam ma yin nam/_'gog pa'am/_'gog pa ma yin nam/_chos sam/_chos ma yin nam/_dge ba'am/_
[\[329a.5\]]dge ba ma yin nam/_stong pa'am/_stong pa ma yin nam snyam du the tshom za ba ste/_mdo sde 'di mnyan na de lta bu'i the tshom thams cad yongs su chod par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu gal te gang mdo sde 'di ma thos na/_gzhan yang the tshom rnam pa mang po yod par 
[\[329a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_gzugs bdag yin nam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag yin nam/_'on te mig gis mthong ngam/_bdag gis mthong ba nas/_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du shes par nus sam/_
[\[329a.7\]]bdag gis shes par nus sam/_gzugs kyis rnam par smin pa myong ngam/_bdag gis rnam par smin pa myong ba nas/_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par smin pa myong ngam/_bdag gis rnam par smin pa myong ngam/_gzugs pha rol gyi 'jig rten du 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]'gro'am/_'on te bdag pha rol gyi 'jig rten du 'gro'am/_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma yod dam/_'on te thog ma dang tha ma med pa yin nam snyam the tshom za ba ste/_mdo sde 'di mnyan na de lta bu'i the tshom la sogs pa 
[\[329b.2\]]yang yongs su chod par 'gyur ro/_/yang la la zhig gis log sred can dang /_rtsa ba bzhi nyams pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba byas pa dang /_mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa la skur pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod dam/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin med 
[\[329b.3\]]snyam the tshom za ba dag kyang mdo sde 'di mnyan na the tshom de dag thams cad yongs su chod par 'gyur ro/_/yang la la zhig gis 'jig rten mtha' yod dam/_'jig rten mtha' med dam/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yod dam phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten med snyam the tshom za 
[\[329b.4\]]ba dag kyang mdo sde 'di mnyan na/_de lta bu'i the tshom dag kyang yongs su chod par 'gyur te/_de ni the tshom dang nem nur gyi sems chod par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/shes rab la g.yo sgyu med pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_gal te sems la the tshom yod na lta ba thams cad 
[\[329b.5\]]yang dag pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/so so'i skye bo dag gal te mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa 'di ma thos na lta ba thams cad log par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang lta ba thams cad log pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byis pa so 
[\[329b.6\]]so'i skye bo dag lta ba log pa zhes bya zhe na/_zag pa dang bcas pa la rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag par lta/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yongs su ma dag pa dang /_bdag med par lta la/_sems can dang /_
[\[329b.7\]]'tsho ba dang /_srog dang /_mthong ba dang /_shes pa yod par lta/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs la mya ngan las 'das pa yin par 'dzin pa dang /_lha dbang sgyur la 'phags pa'i lam brgyad yod par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba ste/_
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]lta ba de dag thams cad ni log pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gal te mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di thos shing 'phags pa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_log par lta ba de dag med par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar na nyan 
[\[330a.2\]]thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang log par lta ba zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs pa na bal glang la bcibs te yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang /_yab ni zas gtsang ma/_yum ni lha mdzes zhes bya ba dang /_grong khyer ser skyar yum gyi 
[\[330a.3\]]lhums su zla ba bcu tshang nas bltam pa dang /_bltams pa'i tshe brgya byin gyis sa la ma reg par bzung ste/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_bsnyen dga' bo gnyis kyis chu phab nas sku bsil ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ma ni ba rta zhes bya bas rin po che'i 
[\[330a.4\]]gdugs thogs pa dang /_sa'i lhas pad mo sprul te zhabs brten pa dang /_phyogs bzhi kun tu gom pa bdun bdun bor ba dang /_lha'i 'jig rten du gshegs nas lha thams cad langs te bsus pa dang /_drang srong a si tas pang du blangs te mtshan bltas pa 
[\[330a.5\]]dang /_mtshan bltas nas bdag ni tshe'i dus byed par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas mngon du gshegs pa mi mthong ngo snyam du sdug bsngal chen po skyes te yid la rab tu gcags pa dang /_slob dpon las yig rtsis dang /_'phong dang /_kha lo sgyur ba dang /_ri mo 
[\[330a.6\]]dang /_lung ston pa dang /_sgyu rtsal slob pa dang /_pho brang gi nang du bu mo dang slas drug khri dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing longs spyod pa dang /_khab nas byung ste 'chag tu gshegs pa las grong khyer ser skya'i sgor mi rgas 'khogs pa mthong ba nas/_de bzhin du dge sbyong 
[\[330a.7\]]chos gos gyon cing 'gro ba'i bar du mthong nas phyir pho brang du phyin te/_bu mo dang slas rnams kyi lus dang gzugs la keng rus dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang /_pho brang yang dur khrod dang tha mi dad par mthong nas/_khyim la skyo bar gyur te nam gyi gung la khab nas byung ste/_
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]drang srong u ta ka dang /_a la tsa la sogs pa'i gan du phyin nas de dag las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched stengs dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dag bshad pa thos so/_/thos nas skye mched la yongs su brtags na mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[330b.2\]]yongs su ma dag pa dang /_bdag med pa yin par rtogs nas de spangs te shing drung na lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa dang /_de ltar dka' ba spyod kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/_de nas yang chu bo dga' skyed ces bya ba'i nang du 
[\[330b.3\]]khrus byas nas gnag rdzi mos 'o ma'i 'jams phul ba bzhes pa dang /_bzhes nas byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te bdud sdig to can btul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas bA rA Na sIr dge slong sde lnga la thog ma chos kyi 
[\[330b.4\]]'khor lo bskor ba nas grong khyer rtswa mchog 'dir yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du de lta bur lta ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag log par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di mnyan 
[\[330b.5\]]cing gzungs su bzung na/_lta ba gong ma de dag kun sel bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te yi ger bris shing klog gam/_'don tam/_khong du chud par byed dam/_gzhan la rgyas par ston tam/_don yid la byed na shes rab yang dag pa thob par 'gyur te/_log par lta 
[\[330b.6\]]ba med par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo 'di la nan tan byas na/_byang chub sems dpas bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs shing yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa 
[\[330b.7\]]nas/_grong khyer rtswa mchog tu yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i bar du rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa'i don zab mo shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_yongs 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po 'di las sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod pas phas pham pa bzhi nyams pa 'thol bar byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la skur ba'i sems bsal ba dang /_mtshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba ma lus 
[\[331a.2\]]par byed pa dang /_log sred can gyi sems med par byas nas de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni dgongs te gsungs pa'i don zab mo zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar na don shin tu zab mo zhe na/_
[\[331a.3\]]sems can la yang dag par bdag med par shes kyang ma 'ongs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med par mi 'gyur bar yid ches pa dang /_phung po lnga 'di nyid du ma lus par 'gog par shes mod kyi/_dge ba dang sdig pa'i las rnams kyang med par mi 'gyur bar shes 
[\[331a.4\]]pa dang /_las rnam pa mang po yod mod kyi byed pa po dmigs su med pa dang /_phyin pa'i gnas yod mod kyi 'gro ba med pa dang /_'ching ba yod mod kyi/_bcings pa med pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yod mod kyi 'gog pa med par shes pa ste/_de ni dgongs te 
[\[331a.5\]]gsungs pa'i don zab mo zhes bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba mtho btsun dpal gyi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma thos 
[\[331a.6\]]pa thos par 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba'i don de lta ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gal te mchis pa zhig lags na ni nges par mchis pa'i chos can no/_/gal te ma mchis na yang nges par ma mchis pa'i chos can lags na/_ma mchis pa'i skye ba'i yang mi rigs/_
[\[331a.7\]]mchis pa ni 'gog pa'i yang mi rigs te/_ji ltar thos pa de yang thos pa zhes bgyi la/_gang ma thos pa yang ma thos pa lags na/_ci'i slad du ma thos pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das gang mi thos pa ni thos pa'i yang mi rigs/_gang sngar 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]thos pa ni gdod thos par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sngar thos lags pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na ci'i slad du ma thos pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs/_dper na 'gro ba ni phyin lags na mi 'gro'o/_/'gro na phyin pa ma lags so/_/gzhan yang dper na 
[\[331b.2\]]skyes nas mi skye ste/_mi skye ba ni skye bar mi 'gyur/_thob nas mi thob ste/_mi thob pa ni thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/thos nas mi thos te/_mi thos pa ni thos par mi 'gyur ba yang de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te mi thos pa thos par gyur na/_sems can thams cad 
[\[331b.3\]]byang chub ma mchis pa yang mchis par 'gyur ba'i rigs/_mya ngan las 'das pa ma thob pa yang thob pa'i rigs/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ma mthong ba yang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong ba'i rigs na/_ci'i slad du yang 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la 
[\[331b.4\]]gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong mod kyi/_mngon du gsal bar ma gyur to zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das gal te ma thos pa thos par 'gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pas sngon su las gsan/_gal te gsan pa zhig lags na/_ci'i slad du de bzhin 
[\[331b.5\]]gshegs pas lung las ston pa med do zhes gsungs/_gal te ma thos pa thos pas de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags na/_sems can thams cad kyang ma thos pa thos pas de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[331b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i rigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gal te mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo 'di ma thos par sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong bar gyur na/_sems can thams cad kyang mdo sde 'di ma thos pa lags te/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin 
[\[331b.7\]]mthong ba'i rigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs kha cig ni mthong /_kha cig ni mi mthong /_sgra yang de bzhin te/_kha cig ni thos/_kha cig ni mi thos te/_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ni gzugs ma lags/_sgra ma lags na/_ci'i slad du mthong ngo 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]thos so zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das 'das pa ni 'gags lags pas mi thos/_ma 'ongs pa ni ma phyin pas mi thos/_da ltar mnyan pa'i tshe ni thos pa zhes mi bgyi ste/_thos nas sgra 'gags pas na thos par mi 'gyur te/_mya 
[\[332a.2\]]ngan las 'das pa chen po 'di yang 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar ma lags la/_gal te dus gsum ma lags na brjod du ma mchis/_gal te brjod du ma mchis na thos par yang mi 'gyur na ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa chen 
[\[332a.3\]]po'i mdo sde 'di la nan tan bgyis na ma thos pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba mtho btsun dpal gyi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi 
[\[332a.4\]]bu khyod kyis chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_chu la ri mo bris pa dang /_gzhan yang chu'i chu bur dang /_dbu ba dang /_chu shing lta bur gsob gsog snying po med pa dang /_'tsho ba ma yin/_bdag ma yin/_sdug bsngal 
[\[332a.5\]]dang bde ba med par rtogs pa ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis shes pa dang mthong ba ltar shin tu rtogs pa legs so/_/de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du skad cig yud tsam gyis 'od snang ba chen po sngon po ma yin par sngon por mthong ba/_
[\[332a.6\]]ser po ma yin par ser por mthong ba/_dmar po ma yin par dmar por mthong ba/_dkar po ma yin par dkar por mthong ba/_kha dog ma yin par kha dog tu mthong ba/_snang ba ma yin par snang bar mthong ba/_mthong ba ma yin par mthong bar gyur pa la mthong ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[332a.7\]]de'i tshe 'khor mang po dag la 'od des reg nas lus dang sems rab tu bde ba ni ji ltar dge sbyong dag seng ge'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'od zer 'di dag ga 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]las byung zhes gsol to/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung ste ma bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang 'jam dpal la ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od 'dis 'khor mang po snang bar 'gyur ces dris pa dang /_'jam dpal yang cang mi smra ste 
[\[332b.2\]]lan ma btab bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la 'di su yi 'od ces dris so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung cang mi smra ste lan ma btab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag gnas pa'i rgyal bus 
[\[332b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa la ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'khor mang po'i nang na 'od 'di yod par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa yang cang mi smra ste lan ma btab bo/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya rnams 
[\[332b.4\]]gcig la gcig de ltar dris mod kyi/_gang gis kyang lan btab pa med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'khor mang po 'di dag gi nang na 'od 'di snang bar gyur ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[332b.5\]]'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'od 'di ni ye shes lags te ye shes zhes bgyi ba ni rtag tu gnas pa'i chos can no/_/rtag tu gnas pa'i chos can la ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od 
[\[332b.6\]]'di byung bar gyur zhes bka' stsal/_'od 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bgyi ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni rtag tu gnas pa'i chos can lags te/_rtag tu gnas pa'i chos can ni rgyu dang rkyen las ma byung na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 
[\[332b.7\]]'das kyis ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od 'di yod par gyur ces bka' stsal/_'od 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba ni rtag tu gnas pa'i chos can lags te/_rtag tu gnas pa'i chos can ni rgyu dang rkyen las 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]ma byung na/_ci ste de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen ces bka' stsal/_'od 'di ni byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po zhes bgyi ste/_byams pa dang snying rje chen po zhes bgyi ba ni rtag tu gnas pa'i chos can lags te/_rtag tu gnas pa'i chos can ni rgyu dang rkyen las ma byung

[\[333a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen zhes bka' stsal/_'od 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i lam zhes bgyi ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong ma lags pa'i lam ni rtag tu gnas pa'i chos can lags te/_rtag tu gnas pa'i chos ni 
[\[333a.4\]]rgyu dang rkyen las ma byung na/_ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen zhes bka' stsal/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis so/_/ma rig pa 'gags pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[333a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shin tu zab mo'i don dam pa la ma 'jug par kun rdzob tu brjod cing smros shig_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i 
[\[333a.6\]]klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi g.yo ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_sangs rgyas de bzhugs pa'i gnas ni chu zheng gab par dpag tshad khri nyis stong ste/_de'i sa gzhi ni rin po che sna bdun sha stag ste/_sa dang gseg ma med do/_/shin tu mnyam 
[\[333a.7\]]zhing 'jam ste/_sa la sal sul dang shang shong med do/_/shing rnams ni gser dang /_dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang rin po che sna bzhi las byas te/_dus thams cad du me tog dang 'bras bu rab tu rgyas so/_/gal te sems can gang me tog gi bsung gis phog na lus dang sems 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]rab tu bde ba ni ji ltar dge slong dag bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs pa bzhin no/_/de'i kho ra khor yug tu klung chen po sum stong yod de/_de'i chu shin tu bzang la yon tan brgyad dang ldan no/_/gal te sems can gang de'i nang du khrus byas na dga' ba dang bde ba thob 
[\[333b.2\]]pa ni ji ltar dge slong dag bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhugs pa dang 'dra'o/_/klung de la me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang /_pun da rI ka dang /_me tog bsung ldan dang /_bsung chen dang /_me tog bsung dam pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[333b.3\]]kyis dbang mi bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba'i me tog rnam pa mang po rnam pa sna tshogs mchis so/_/klung de'i 'gram na yang me tog rnam pa mang po mchis pa ni 'di lta ste/_me tog a ti mug ta ka dang /_me tog tsam pa ka dang /_me tog pa ta la dang /_me tog pa shi la dang /_me tog 
[\[333b.4\]]ma ri ka dang /_me tog ma ri ka chen po dang /_me tog si ma ri ka dang /_me tog su ma na dang /_me tog yu de ka dang /_me tog dan du ri ka dang /_me tog rtag pa dang /_sems can thams cad dbang mi bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba'i me tog la sogs pa'o/_/klung de'i gting 
[\[333b.5\]]ni gser gyi bye mas bdal te/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thang ma skas bzhin mchis te/_bya mang po rnam pa sna tshogs de'i steng na 'du zhing /_gzhan yang stag dang /_spyang ki dang /_seng ge la sogs pa bya 
[\[333b.6\]]dang gcan gzan ma rungs pa tshad med pa snyed mchis te/_gcig la gcig bu bzhin du blta'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rtsa ba nyams pa dang dam pa'i chos la skur pa dang /_log sred can dang /_mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i kha na ma tho ba bgyid 
[\[333b.7\]]pa ma mchis so/_/zhing de na grang dro ran te bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa yang ma mchis so/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_bag med pa dang /_phrag dog kyang ma mchis so/_/nyi zla dang nyin mtshan dang dus ma mchis te/_
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gnam dang mtshungs te/_de'i mi rnams kyang 'od dang ldan no/_/so so na rgyags pa dang dregs pa'i sems ma mchis te/_thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po mngon par shes pa thob pa yon tan chen po 
[\[334a.2\]]dang ldan pa/_dam pa'i chos la rim gro dang bsti stang gi sems 'jog pa/_theg pa chen pos bteg pa/_theg pa chen po la dad pa/_theg pa chen po la mos pa/_theg pa chen po la srung ba/_shes rab chen po dang ldan pa/_gzungs chen po thob pa/_sems 
[\[334a.3\]]can thams cad la rtag tu snying brtse ba sha stag go/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan ni zla ba rgyas pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten rig 
[\[334a.4\]]pa/_bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/_gang nas gang du chos ston kyang zhing de'i sems can dag gis mi thos pa gcig kyang ma mchis so/_/sangs rgyas de byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[334a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces bgyi ba la 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo 'di ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo la nan tan byas na/_
[\[334a.6\]]sngon ma thos pa kun thos par 'gyur ro zhes ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces bgyi ba des/_sangs rgyas zla ba rgyas pa'i 'od de la zhu ba yang ji ltar na 'di nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba mtho btsun dpal 
[\[334a.7\]]gyi rgyal pos zhus pa dang 'dra ste tha dad pa ma mchis so/_/sangs rgyas zla ba rgyas pa'i 'od des byang chub sems dpa' bai dUr+ya'i 'od la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]mi mjed ces bya ba yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na ri dang brag dang cong rong dang khrad khrod dang /_gseg ma dang tsher ma ma rungs pas kun tu yongs su gang ste/_rtag tu bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_grang ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal gyis rnam par 
[\[334b.2\]]gzir to/_/zhing de'i mi dag dge sbyong dang bram ze dang pha ma dang slob dpon dang /_bla ma la bkur sti mi byed de/_chos ma yin pa la zhen pa dang /_chos ma yin pa la 'dod cing chags pa dang log pa dang chos spyod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la yid mi ches pa 
[\[334b.3\]]dang /_tshe'i tshad rab tu thung ba dang /_nyes pa byed pa dag yod na rgyal pos chad pas gcod pa dang /_rgyal po dag yul dang srid yod bzhin du chog cing ngoms mi shes te/_gzhan gyi bdog pa la 'dod pa'i sems bskyed nas/_dmag gis btab pas 
[\[334b.4\]]glo bur du shi ba mang ngo /_/rgyal pos de ltar chos ma yin pa spyod pas rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dge ba dag mi dga' bas than chen byung ba dang nas 'bras mi skye ba dang /_mi nad mang ba dang /_sdug bsngal tshad med pa mang pos gdung ba de na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa

[\[334b.6\]]'das thugs rje chen po lhag par che bas/_sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir grong khyer rtswa mchog tu sA la'i shing drung na/_'khor mang po rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba mtho btsun

[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]sems dpa' bai dUr+ya'i 'od kyis dngos po de lta bu dag thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas te/_'dir mchi bas snga ltas 'di byung ste/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis 'od 'di mchis par gyur

[\[335a.3\]]phreng ba dang /_rol mo'i rnams snga ma bas phul du byung ba mang po rnam pa sna tshogs bshams te/_thams cad grong khyer rtswa mchog tu sA la'i shing drung 'dir lhags nas so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/_bcom

[\[335a.6\]]pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du byed thams cad gal te rtag na yang 'ong ba ma mchis la/_mi rtag pa lags na yang 'ong ba ma mchis te/_so so'i skye bo dag gang sems can gyi rang bzhin mchis par lta ba ni 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba ma mchis so/_/
[\[335a.7\]]bdag gis ni sems can gyi rang bzhin du nges pa ma mthong na ci'i slad du 'ongs sam ma 'ongs zhes bka' stsal/_gang nga rgyal can dag ni song ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis par mthong gi_/nga rgyal ma mchis pa la ni song ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis so/_/gang len 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]pa dang bcas pa ni song ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis par mthong gi len pa ma mchis pa la ni song ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis so/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yun du mya ngan las 'da' bar mthong ba ni song ba dang 'ong ba mchis par mthong gi_/de bzhin gshegs pa
